attributes.action: call a referendum to  ensure that the People endorse any further House of Lords reform
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A fully elected House of Lords risks a second chamber again full of professional politicians. Appointed peers can be important for the expertise and impartiality they may provide.

Of course, some may disagree with this and want a fully elected chamber anyway because of the democratic function it would fulfil - but what is important is that the people of Britain can endorse or reject such a major constitutional change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
